title: Aural set, horn concerto - phrase 1 feature

content.prompt: Which of the following features is found in phrase 1?

choices.label: Alternating two-part and three-part divisions of the beat
Three-part divisions of the beat, first in the horn and then in the accompaniment

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
